title: How to Instantly Make Foundation Lighter

steps.title: Understand what is required.
steps.content: Understand what is required. If a foundation is too dark, then you need to do what any good artist would do––add lighter colors to tone down the darkness and raise the hue. This means that you'll be adding lighter colored cosmetic items that change the tint in the foundation, helping it to become lighter. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Get your foundation.
steps.content: Get your foundation. Place it carefully in an empty tub. Check that the tub has no other product left in it.

steps.title: Put 2 tablespoons of your usual hand cream into the tub.
steps.content: Put 2 tablespoons of your usual hand cream into the tub. Mix until the cream is nearly gone, but a bit is still visible. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Put 1/2 a teaspoon of cream eyeshadow into the mixture.
steps.content: Put 1/2 a teaspoon of cream eyeshadow into the mixture.

steps.title: Blend all of the creams together.
steps.content: Blend all of the creams together.

steps.title: Get two pinches of powdered compact.
steps.content: Get two pinches of powdered compact. Once again, blend these together.

steps.title: Mix it all up.
steps.content: Mix it all up. When it's ready to go, apply it to your face with your foundation brush, as you otherwise would. If you start mixing and find the shade isn't quite right, try altering the proportions of cream, eyeshadow, face powder, and foundation until you get the right combination.

steps.title: Get your favorite foundation.
steps.content: Get your favorite foundation. Place it into a mixing container. Use only a small amount; you can always add more later.

steps.title: Get your favorite moisturizer or body lotion.
steps.content: Get your favorite moisturizer or body lotion. However, do note that it is best to use an unscented version for this fix.

steps.title: Add a larger amount of moisturizer or body lotion to the foundation.
steps.content: Add a larger amount of moisturizer or body lotion to the foundation.

steps.title: Stir to combine.
steps.content: Stir to combine. Each ingredient should be thoroughly combined. Check the color; add more of either the lotion/moisturizer or the foundation, according to your color need.

steps.title: Use as you normally would.
steps.content: Use as you normally would. Spread it on evenly and see the color change.
